item.title: 常用的漏洞分析工具note
item.description: IDA hopper radare2 ghidra JEB-MIPS ollydbg gdb pwngdb gef peda burpsuite linux command file readelf strings objdump hexdump strace ltrace binwalk checksec qemu dockerhub： https://hub.docker.com/u/waveburst 封装了QEMU system模式的arm,mips的docker镜像 参考链接: https://reverseengineering.stackexchange.com/questions/1817/is-there-any-disassembler-to-rival-ida-pro
